privacy.title: How we protect your data
privacy.intro: Privacy matters to us. You decide what to share about your dreams, and we will not share anything beyond what you approve.

sections.title: 1. Data we collect
sections.body: We collect only what‚Äôs needed to run the platform: username, email, dreams you choose to share, and anonymous usage data to improve performance. Data is stored securely and encrypted.

sections.title: 2. Choice, sharing, and removal
sections.body: You can choose not to share private dreams, delete interpretations, or cancel your account at any time. Requests to access, correct, or delete data are handled within a reasonable time.

sections.title: 3. Storage and security
sections.body: Alongside internal access limits, we only provide information that aligns with the law. Even after closing an account we keep only essential data for security and compliance.
